verbose_text: For instance, the mRNA level of AtABCG36 is elevated during plant infection with virulent and avirulent strains of the bacterial pathogen Pseudomonas syringae [XREF_BIBR] as observed in the less susceptible species (' Kumquat '), which up-regulated a higher number of ABC G transcripts than the highly susceptible species (' Galego ') (XREF_FIG).
